channel.title: 508 Error

item.title: 508 Error
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I added dragonfire shield operate but when ever i operate it, it laggs me out.

case 11283: Player p2 = Server.engine.players[p.fighting]; p2.appendHit(Misc.random(30), 0); if(p.DFStimer == 0) { if(p.fighting == 0) { p.requestAnim(6695, 0); p.requestGFX(1164, 0); p2.appendHit(Misc.random(30), 0); p.raidDelay = 120; } } if(p.DFStimer > 0) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You must wait before you can use DFS fire."); } if(p.fighting == 1) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You must attack someone first."); }
